name: Too Cheesy For Me
description:
"Too Cheesy For Me" is a !Work In Progress! Action Shoot 'Em Up video game made with Unity with a Top Down view in which a crazy scientist, with an army of different cheeses, has taken control of the world. You play as John, last hope for the human kind, and must travel across the USA to end once and for all the evil scientist's reign.

On your way there, you will have to slay Gouda, Emmental, Babybel, and many other types of rogue cheese, beat Bosses, such as Camembert and others. 
You will make strange friends, a Bear and a peaceful Cheese, who will help you throughout your adventure.

For this game, a Game Concept Document was created, with an early prototype of the game.

This project was my second personal project, which was made in 2 weeks, alone at home.
